IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: THE ROTARY CLUB OF POWHATAN WILL CONTINUOUSLY STRIVE TO BE AWARE OF THE NEEDS OF OUR NEIGHBORS, YOUTH, AND OUR COMMUNITY. WE WILL, TO THE BEST OF OUR ABILITY AND TO THE EXTENT OUR RESOURCES ALLOW, STRIVE TO HELP THOSE IN NEED AND TO RAISE THEIR HOPES FOR THE FUTURE. WE WILL STRIVE TO EXEMPLIFY THE HIGH IDEALS AND STANDARDS OF ROTARY INTERNATIONAL.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: WEEKLY MEETINGS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE MEMBERS TO DISCUSS BUSINESS, LISTEN TO SPEAKERS, PLAN FUNDRAISERS, AND INTERACT ON A SOCIAL AND BUSINESS BASIS
NET PROCEEDS FROM FUNDRAISERS GIVEN TO VARIOUS LOCAL CHARITIES BASED UPON RECOMMENDATIONS FROM THE CHARITY COMMITTEE. THE CLUB HAD 2 MAJOR FUNDRAISERS DURING THE YEAR.

ROTARY INTERNATIONAL DUES AND DISTRICT 7600 DUES PAID FOR MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION IN ORDER FOR THE MEMBER TO BECOME A MEMBER OF ROTARY INTERNATIONAL AND FUNCTION UNDERE THEIR BYLAWS, GOALS AND LONG RANGE PLANS
